items.label: Controlling Program Flow and Making Decisions

open-assembly-and-drawing-from-userform.title: VBA Userforms - Open new Assembly and Drawing document
open-assembly-and-drawing-from-userform.description: In this post, we learn how can we Open new Assembly and Drawing document from a Visual Basic for Application's Userform.

open-part-from-userform.title: VBA Userforms - Open new Part document
open-part-from-userform.description: In this post, we learn how can we open a part document from a Visual Basic for Application's Userform.

testing-open-assembly-and-drawing-docume.title: VBA Userforms - Testing Open new Assembly and Drawing document

vba-arrays.title: VBA Arrays
vba-arrays.description: Most programming languages support arrays. An array is a group of variables that share a common name.

vba-assignment-statement-and-operator.title: VBA Assignment Statements And Operators
vba-assignment-statement-and-operator.description: An assignment statement is a VBA statement that assigns the result of an expression to a variable or an object.

vba-bug-finding.title: Bug Finding
vba-bug-finding.description: A bug is an error in your programming. Here I cover the topic of programming bugs — how to identify them and how to remove them from your module.

vba-bug-reduction-tips.title: VBA Bug Reduction Tips
vba-bug-reduction-tips.description: I can’t tell you how to completely eliminate bugs in your programs.

vba-constant.title: VBA Constants
vba-constant.description: A variable’s value may (and usually does) change while your procedure is executing.

vba-controlling-flow-making-desicions.title: Controlling Program Flow and Making Decisions
vba-controlling-flow-making-desicions.description: Some VBA procedures start at the code’s beginning and progress line by line to the end, never deviating from this top-to-bottom program flow.

vba-debugger.title: VBA Debugger
vba-debugger.description: In this section, I discuss the details of using the VBA debugging tools.

vba-declaring-and-scoping-of-variables.title: Declaring and Scoping of Variables
vba-declaring-and-scoping-of-variables.description: If you read the previous topics, you now know a bit about Variables and Data-types.

vba-dialog-boxes.title: VBA Dialog Boxes
vba-dialog-boxes.description: You can’t use VBA very long without being exposed to dialog boxes.

vba-executing-procedures.title: Executing Sub and Function Procedures
vba-executing-procedures.description: Although you may not know much about developing procedures at this point, I’m going to jump ahead a bit and discuss how to execute these procedures.

vba-functions.title: VBA Functions
vba-functions.description: A function essentially performs a calculation and returns a single value.

vba-if-then-structure-select-case.title: If-Then-Else and Select Case structure
vba-if-then-structure-select-case.description: If-Then is VBA’s most important control structure. You’ll probably use this command on a daily basis.

vba-inputbox-function.title: VBA InputBox Function
vba-inputbox-function.description: The VBA's InputBox function is useful for obtaining a single piece of information from the user.

vba-introduction.title: VBA Introduction
vba-introduction.description: To understand Visual Basic for Application, lets look at the following questions.

vba-looping.title: VBA Looping
vba-looping.description: The term looping refers to repeating a block of VBA statements numerous times.

vba-more-function.title: VBA Functions that do more
vba-more-function.description: A few VBA functions go above and beyond the call of duty. Rather than simply return a value, these functions have some useful side effects.

vba-msgBox-function.title: VBA MsgBox Function
vba-msgBox-function.description: You’re probably already familiar with the VBA MsgBox function — I use it quite a bit in the examples.

vba-other-dialog.title: VBA GetOpenFilename, GetSaveAsFilename and Getting a Folder Name
vba-other-dialog.description: If your VBA procedure needs to ask the user for a filename, you could use the InputBox function.

vba-programming-concepts.title: Programming Concepts, Comments and Data-types
vba-programming-concepts.description: Visual Basic for application (VBA) is a real, live programming language, it uses many elements common to all programming languages.

vba-publc-static-variable-life.title: Public, Static and Variable's Life
vba-publc-static-variable-life.description: In the following sections we will discussed about following topics:

vba-string-basic.title: VBA String Basics
vba-string-basic.description: The String data type represents a series of characters. This topic introduces the basic concepts of strings in Visual Basic.

vba-sub-and-function-procedure.title: Sub and Function Procedures
vba-sub-and-function-procedure.description: The VBA code that you write in the Visual Basic Editor is known as a procedure.

vba-userform.title: VBA UserForms
vba-userform.description: A UserForm is useful if your VBA macro needs to get information from a user.

vba-variable-scope.title: Variable Scope
vba-variable-scope.description: A variable’s scope determines which modules and procedures can use the variable.

vba-variables.title: VBA Variables
vba-variables.description: VBA’s main purpose is to manipulate data. VBA stores the data in your computer’s memory; it may or may not end up on disk.

vbe-editor.title: Visual Basic Editor (VBE)
vbe-editor.description: Visual Basic Editor or VBE is a separate application in your CAD application.

vbe-windows.title: VBE Windows
vbe-windows.description: In this post we look following windows in Visual Basic Editor:
